text: Ware ga hitobito no tame, fudan ni takaru basho to shite, mata heian no ba to shite, kono-ka (kaapa) o moketa toki o omoiokose. (Ware wa meijita. ) `Iburahimu no (reihai ni) tatta tokoro o, anata gata no reihai no ba to shi nasai.'
